questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An art installation
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A neon flower sculpture
C) A group of people
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A bench
B) A neon flower sculpture with an eye
C) A statue
D) A fountain

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass and mulch
B) A sidewalk
C) A street
D) Water

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A building and trees
B) A beach
C) A mountain range
D) A busy street

What colors are prominent in the neon flower sculpture?
A) Blue and yellow
B) Red, orange, and purple
C) Green and brown
D) Black and white

What is unique about the center of the flower in the sculpture?
A) It has a clock
B) It has an eye
C) It has a butterfly
D) It has a star

What type of greenery is visible in the background?
A) Cacti
B) Shrubs and trees
C) Palm trees
D) Flower beds

What material appears to be used for the flower sculpture?
A) Metal and neon lights
B) Wood
C) Stone
D) Plastic

What is the dominant color of the flower's petals in the sculpture?
A) Blue
B) Orange
C) Yellow
D) Green

What feature is highlighted in the center of the flower?
A) A sun
B) An eye
C) A moon
D) A heart

What surrounds the neon flower sculpture at the base?
A) Water
B) Mulch and small plants
C) Sand
D) Rocks

What kind of lighting does the flower sculpture have?
A) Natural sunlight
B) Neon lighting
C) LED strips
D) Candlelight

How many main flowers are visible in the sculpture?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

Which colors are used for the smaller flowers in the sculpture?
A) Blue, purple and yellow, pink  
B) Pink and yellow
C) Red and green
D) White and black

What is the texture of the ground where the sculpture is placed?
A) Sandy
B) Mulched
C) Rocky
D) Grassy

What is the shape of the flower's stem in the sculpture?
A) Straight
B) Curved
C) Wavy
D) Spiral

What is the color of the flower's stem in the sculpture?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What element in the sculpture draws the most attention?
A) The petals
B) The eye in the center and the border
C) The leaves
D) The base

What is the design on the base of the sculpture?
A) Floral patterns
B) Geometric shapes
C) Animal prints
D) Abstract designs

What is the visual impact of the eye in the flower?
A) It blends in
B) It stands out prominently
C) It is barely noticeable
D) It is hidden

What is the position of the eye in the flower?
A) At the edge
B) In the center
C) At the base
D) Near the top

What is the relationship between the sculpture and its surroundings?
A) It blends in seamlessly
B) It contrasts with the natural environment
C) It is hidden among the plants
D) It is overshadowed by other elements

What kind of lighting effect does the neon create?
A) A soft glow
B) A bright, vibrant light
C) A flickering light
D) A dim light

What is the overall impression of the sculpture?
A) Minimalistic
B) Intricate and colorful
C) Monochromatic
D) Rustic
